channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [KTKBANK] Karnataka Bank Branches May Be Affected by UFBU Strike on Jan 27, 2026
item.description:
The All India Karnataka Bank Employees Association (AIKBEA) and Karnataka Bank Officers Organisation (KBOO), affiliated to the AIBEA and AIBOA respectively, under the banner of United Forum of Bank Unions (UFBU) have given a call for a one-day strike on 27.01.2026. The strike is due to demands for a 5-day banking week, regulated working hours, and opposition to the disinvestment process in IDBI and 3 RRBs. If the strike materializes, the normal functioning of the Bank's branches, offices, and departments may be affected. The Bank is taking necessary steps to ensure normal functioning. The expected quantum of loss or damages and the impact on operations are not quantified.

  • AIKBEA and KBOO have given a call for a one-day strike on 27.01.2026
  • Strike is due to demands for a 5-day banking week and regulated working hours
  • Strike also opposes the disinvestment process in IDBI and 3 RRBs
  • Bank branches, offices, and departments may be affected if the strike materializes
  • Bank is taking necessary steps to ensure normal functioning

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: KARNATAKA BANK LTD. | Category: Strike

item.title: [INDIAHOME] India Home Loan Ltd. to Approve Un-audited Financial Results for Q3 & 9M 2025 and Increase Authorised Share Capital
item.description:
India Home Loan Ltd. has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on 30th January 2026 to consider and approve the un-audited financial results for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December 2025. The Board will also consider increasing the authorized share capital of the company and amending the Memorandum of Association, subject to shareholders' approvals. The dealing window for equity shares of the company is closed from 1st January 2026 till 48 hours after the declaration of financial results.

  • Board meeting scheduled on 30th January 2026
  • Consideration and approval of un-audited financial results for Q3 & 9M 2025
  • Proposal to increase authorized share capital and amend Memorandum of Association
  • Shareholders' approvals required for proposed changes
  • Dealing window for equity shares closed from 1st January 2026

Company: INDIA HOME LOAN LTD. | Category: Quarterly Result

item.title: [COFORGE] Coforge Ltd Reports Q3 FY2026 Earnings, Releases Transcript of Earnings Conference Call
item.description:
Coforge Ltd has announced the transcript of its Earnings Conference Call for Q3 FY2026. The announcement was made in accordance with Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. The conference call was held after the Board meeting on January 23, 2026. The transcript is available on the company's website for investors.

  • Coforge Ltd has released the transcript of its Q3 FY2026 Earnings Conference Call.
  • The release of the transcript is in accordance with Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
  • The conference call was held after the Board meeting on January 23, 2026.
  • The transcript is available for investors on the company's website.

item.title: [POWERGRID] Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd Announces Changes in Senior Management
item.description:
Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd has announced changes in its senior management. The Board of Directors has approved the promotion/appointment of Sanjay Sharma, Abhay Kumar, Abhinav Verma, Vineeta Agarwal, M S Hejib, Akhilesh Kumar Dixit, Kumud Wadhwa, and Harinarayanan Puthan Kalam as Executive Directors. These changes are effective from 25th January 2026. The new appointees bring a combined experience of over 200 years in various fields including telecom marketing, commercial, corporate planning, asset monetization, electrical engineering, project management, and human resource management.

  • Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd has announced changes in its senior management.
  • Sanjay Sharma, Abhay Kumar, Abhinav Verma, Vineeta Agarwal, M S Hejib, Akhilesh Kumar Dixit, Kumud Wadhwa, and Harinarayanan Puthan Kalam have been appointed as Executive Directors.
  • The new appointees bring a combined experience of over 200 years in various fields.
  • The appointments are effective from 25th January 2026.
  • The new appointees have diverse experience in telecom marketing, commercial, corporate planning, asset monetization, electrical engineering, project management, and human resource management.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: POWER GRID CORPORATION OF INDIA LTD. | Category: New Launch

item.title: [MEDPLUS] Medplus Health Services Subsidiary Faces Three-Day Drug License Suspension in Telangana
item.description:
Medplus Health Services Ltd. has announced that its subsidiary, Optival Health Solutions Private Limited, has received a suspension order for a Drug License of a store situated in the state of Telangana. The suspension is issued under Rule 65 of the Drugs and Cosmetics Act, 1945 and Drugs and Cosmetics Rules, 1945. The order, issued by the Assistant Director, Drugs Control License, Telangana, will result in a potential revenue loss of Rs 2.94 lacs for the three-day suspension period. The company will post the order on its website and on the websites of BSE Limited and National Stock Exchange of India Ltd.

  • Medplus Health Services' subsidiary, Optival Health Solutions Private Limited, receives a three-day suspension order for a Drug License in Telangana.
  • The suspension is issued under Rule 65 of the Drugs and Cosmetics Act, 1945 and Drugs and Cosmetics Rules, 1945.
  • The suspension will potentially cause a revenue loss of Rs 2.94 lacs for the three-day period.
  • The order is available on the company's website and the websites of BSE Limited and National Stock Exchange of India Ltd.
  • Medplus Health Services is taking necessary actions to comply with the order and manage the impact on their financials.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Medplus Health Services Ltd | Category: Legal

item.title: [POWERGRID] Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd Announces Changes in Senior Management
item.description:
Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd has announced changes in its senior management. The Board of Directors has approved the promotion/appointment of five senior level officials as Executive Directors (ED) effective from 25th January, 2026. The new appointees include Sanjay Sharma, Abhay Kumar, Abhinav Verma, Vineeta Agarwal, and M S Hejib. The company has also announced the promotion of Akhilesh Kumar Dixit and Harinarayanan Puthan Kalam to Executive Directors. Kumud Wadhwa has been appointed as Executive Director (ERP & IT).

  • Power Grid Corporation of India Ltd has announced changes in its senior management.
  • Five senior level officials have been promoted/appointed as Executive Directors (ED) effective from 25th January, 2026.
  • Akhilesh Kumar Dixit and Harinarayanan Puthan Kalam have been promoted to Executive Directors.
  • Kumud Wadhwa has been appointed as Executive Director (ERP & IT).
  • The new appointees bring a combined experience of over 180 years in various fields including telecom marketing, commercial, corporate planning, asset monetization, substation engineering, asset management, international consultancy, engineering functions, HVDC technology, corporate planning, distribution management system, HR management, and IT.

Company: POWER GRID CORPORATION OF INDIA LTD. | Category: New Launch

item.title: [JPASSOCIAT] Jaiprakash Associates Executive Director Released on Interim Bail
item.description:
Jaiprakash Associates Ltd. has informed that Shri Manoj Gaur, the Executive Director of the company, who was arrested by the Enforcement Directorate in connection with an ongoing investigation under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA) initiated against Jaypee Infratech Ltd. and Jaiprakash Associates Ltd., has been released on Interim Bail for 14 days by the Honâ€™ble Court of Additional Sessions Judge-7, Patiala House, New Delhi on 24th January 2026. This information is in continuation to the disclosure made on 13th November 2025.

  • Shri Manoj Gaur, Executive Director of Jaiprakash Associates Ltd., has been released on Interim Bail for 14 days.
  • The bail was granted by the Honâ€™ble Court of Additional Sessions Judge-7, Patiala House, New Delhi on 24th January 2026.
  • Gaur was arrested in connection with an ongoing investigation under the Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA) against Jaypee Infratech Ltd. and Jaiprakash Associates Ltd.

item.title: [SPICEISL] Spice Islands Industries Ltd. Receives First Export Order from UAE Worth INR 13.8 Million
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Spice Islands Industries Ltd. has announced its first international purchase order from Emazing Deals, UAE, for the supply of perfumes, amounting to USD 166,136 (INR 13.8 million). The company will execute this order by placing a corresponding purchase order with Sterling Perfumes Industries LLC, UAE, the owner of the globally recognized fragrance brand ARMAF. This strategic milestone marks the beginning of the company's Global Trade vertical, focusing on fragrances, personal care, and lifestyle products. The management believes this order reflects international confidence in their execution capabilities and signals their intent to expand into global markets, particularly across the Middle East and other high-growth regions.

  • Spice Islands Industries Ltd. receives first international purchase order from Emazing Deals, UAE, worth INR 13.8 million.
  • The order will be executed by placing a corresponding purchase order with Sterling Perfumes Industries LLC, UAE, the owner of the ARMAF brand.
  • This strategic milestone marks the beginning of the company's Global Trade vertical.
  • The focus is on fragrances, personal care, and lifestyle products.
  • The management sees this order as a reflection of international confidence in their execution capabilities and an intent to expand into global markets.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SPICE ISLANDS APPARELS LTD.-$ | Category: New Launch

item.title: [CUPIDALBV] Cupid Breweries And Distilleries Ltd to Approve Q2 and Q3 Financial Results on January 29, 2026
item.description:
Cupid Breweries And Distilleries Ltd has announced that its Board of Directors will meet on January 29, 2026, to consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2025, along with the Limited Review Report of the Auditor. The Board will also consider and approve the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and nine months ended December 31, 2025, along with the Limited Review Report of the Auditor. The information will be made available on the company's website.

  • Cupid Breweries And Distilleries Ltd to consider and approve Q2 and Q3 financial results for the year 2025
  • The meeting is scheduled for January 29, 2026
  • The results will be accompanied by the Limited Review Report of the Auditor
  • The information will be made available on the company's website

item.title: [VINYOFL] Vinyoflex Ltd Schedules Board Meeting to Approve Q4 Results of 2025
item.description:
Vinyoflex Ltd has announced a Board of Directors meeting on February 09, 2026, to consider and approve the Unaudited Financial Results for the quarter ended December 31, 2025. The meeting is in accordance with Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015. The trading window for dealing in securities of the Company will be closed for the Designated Persons from January 01, 2026, till 48 hours after the declaration of the Unaudited Financial Results.

  • Vinyoflex Ltd scheduled a Board of Directors meeting on February 09, 2026, to approve Q4 results of 2025.
  • The meeting is in accordance with Regulation 29 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.
  • The trading window for dealing in securities of the Company will be closed for the Designated Persons from January 01, 2026, till 48 hours after the declaration of the Unaudited Financial Results.
